Services.Local.HostManager.Hosts.{HostId.summary: Retrieves the status and configuration parameters in regards to the (specified) HostManager Host.

application/json.example: {"Header": {"Name": "OK"}, "Body": {"Id": "0", "Name": "iPhone", "Address": {"IP": {"v4": "192.168.1.20", "v6": {"LinkLocal": "fe80::5efe:c000:0201", "Global": "3ffe:b00:1:2::5efe:c000:0201"}}, "MAC": "AA:BB:CC:00:11:22"}, "Type": "Phone", "Interface": "Interfaces.Physical.Network.LAN.Wi-Fi.Radios.5ghz.BSSs.Private", "Status": {"State": "Online", "Time": {"Idle": 0, "Connected": 300, "Stamp": "2018-04-09T20:45:00+01:00"}}}}

LinkLocal.description: HostManager Host IPv6 Link Local address.

Id.possible_values: any string with length from 1 up to 64 chars

Name.possible_values: any string with length from 1 up to 64 chars

Offline.description: HostManager Host offline devices count (on specified interface).

Online.description: HostManager Host online devices count (on specified interface).

Total.description: HostManager Host total devices count (on specified interface).

State.possible_values:
- "Online" (connected to the interface with internet connectivity).
- "Pending" (temporarily blocked from Internet access, waiting for user approval).
- "Blocked" (device is blocked from Internet access).
- "Offline" (not connected).

Connected.description: HostManager Host time elapsed since connected.
